$$
\begin{aligned}
  \operatorname{senti\_scale\_s}_{i}  &\sim N \left(\mu, \sigma^2 \right) \\
    \mu &=\alpha_{j[i]} + \beta_{1}(\operatorname{type\_of\_tweet}_{\operatorname{ngsschat-chat}}) + \beta_{2}(\operatorname{type\_of\_tweet}_{\operatorname{ngsschat-non-chat}}) + \beta_{3}(\operatorname{time\_on\_twitter\_s}) + \beta_{5}(\operatorname{year\_of\_post\_centered}) + \beta_{6}(\operatorname{has\_joined\_chat}) + \beta_{0}(\operatorname{adopted\_fct}_{\operatorname{adopted}}) + \beta_{1}(\operatorname{adopted\_fct}_{\operatorname{missing}}) + \beta_{3}(\operatorname{type\_of\_tweet}_{\operatorname{ngsschat-chat}} \times \operatorname{year\_of\_post\_centered}) + \beta_{4}(\operatorname{type\_of\_tweet}_{\operatorname{ngsschat-non-chat}} \times \operatorname{year\_of\_post\_centered}) \\
    \alpha_{j}  &\sim N \left(\gamma_{0}^{\alpha} + \gamma_{1}^{\alpha}(\operatorname{is\_teacher}) + \gamma_{2}^{\alpha}(\operatorname{n\_posted\_chatsessions\_s}) + \gamma_{3}^{\alpha}(\operatorname{n\_posted\_ngsschat\_nonchat\_s}) + \gamma_{4}^{\alpha}(\operatorname{n\_posted\_non\_ngsschat\_s}) + \gamma_{5}^{\alpha}(\operatorname{is\_teacher} \times \operatorname{year\_of\_post\_centered}), \sigma^2_{\alpha_{j}} \right)
    \text{, for user_id j = 1,} \dots \text{,J}
\end{aligned}
$$
